page.title: 19 PRESENT AND FUTURE CONTD.
page.content: Most people seem to think there ought to be more sports facilities.Also people think there ought to be more opportunities for small rural industries. Half of the village think the reservoir should be abandoned and the other half think it should be built. Quite a few people think there should be more development of cheaper housing. Hardly any people think there should be many more houses and a few people think there should be more good quality houses not cheap houses. It is proposed that the{Bull's Head}pub soon going to close and in it's place a housing estate is going to be built. A lot of people are very sorry to lose one of the pubs in spite of the fact they want some cheaper houses.
